Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides for the establishment of a nexus with the state of New York relating to unlawful discriminatory practices
Summary: Provides for the establishment of a nexus with the state of New York relating to unlawful discriminatory practices.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to providing for the establishment of a nexus with the state of New York relating to unlawful discriminatory practices
